definitions: a person who illegally seizes an aircraft, ship, or vehicle while in transit and forces it to go to a different destination or uses it for their own purposes

examples.text: negotiators began talks with the hijackers of the plane

shortDefinitions: person who illegally seizes aircraft, ship, or vehicle while in transit and forces it to go to different destination

definitions: a person who steals goods by seizing them in transit
shortDefinitions: person who steals goods by seizing them in transit

definitions: a person who takes over an organization or activity and uses it for a different purpose

examples.text: these activists are the real hijackers of the revolution
the hijackers of this government ignore all but their own agenda

shortDefinitions: person who takes over organization or activity and use it for different purpose
